activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: Players can purchase both Draw and Scratch Off games from the Gemini Touch.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: Sorry, the answer is True. Players can purchase both Draw and Scratch Off games from the Gemini Touch.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: What is the maximum amount of credits a player can add to the Gemini Touch?

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: Players can add a maximum of $250.00 to the Gemini Touch.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: The Gemini Touch features a Ticket Scan Plus function that allows players to scan Scratch Off and Draw Game ticket bar codes to see if it is a winner.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: The Gemini Touch can carry up to ____ Scratch Off games at a time.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The Gemini Touch can carry up to 24 different Scratch Off games at a time.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: All Reports are available from a single Reports function on the Management Functions menu.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: All Reports are available from one button on the Management Functions menu.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: Which of the following menu options on the Manager Functions screen would you use to activate packs of Scratch Off games?

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The correct response is the Instant Functions button.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: To avoid ticket jams, do not load tickets over 10" into the top bin.

invalid.label: Sorry,
invalid.text: The correct answer is: To avoid ticket jams, do not load tickets over 10" long into the lowest ticket trays bins.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: What are the correct steps to load a partial pack of Scratch Off tickets into the Gemini Touch?

options.label: Scan the last ticket in the pack.
Scan the first ticket in the pack.
Scan the first ticket in the pack and the last ticket in the pack.
Scanning the pack is not necessary; the terminal does not keep track of the tickets loaded into bins.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: You should scan the first ticket in the pack and the last ticket in the pack.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: You just opened the Gemini Touch door and the alarm is sounding. How do you silence it?

options.label: Sign on using the Touch Screen on the Manager Display.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The correct answer is: Sign on using the Touch Screen on the Manager Display.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: All Draw Game tickets produced by the Gemini Touch are Quick Pick Only.
